ygData.messageBody:
more testimonials... the question: Can melee class stand toe to toe and solo an HG?:

"Yes, although they seem a little harder than SG. I can own an SG while all the HG i have tried have gotten me down to one bubble, one time a little less hehe.
Greycloud BloodTalon" (level 50 warrior)

"2081 HPs and 840 AC(self buffs only), Sprinkler and Sash, I solo them without LoH, but it takes all my mana on healing and they usually get me down below half after that.

Vaul TrueHeart
Holy Knight of Marr" (level 50 paladin)

"I killed HGs in west commons with 1586hp (self buffs only), not an arrow shot. Jetal was there to see it.

Tanthalar Silverleaf " (level 50 ranger, full thorny vine, mistwalker, spined dragon claw, RBB)

"Ive tried yesterday with Tsul.

Was a blue HG (Im 47), I had no buffs.

Got him down to 1/4 or so before I got under a bubble and used FD.

It could be done if I was 50 and had better equip (fear gear and better haste) I think.

Im pretty sure Denz could." (Denzalo is a 50 monk with full shiverback, and tons of god/dragon items)



like i said, its all about equipment with melee classes, whether it be planes and dragon armor (thorny vine, valorium, rbb, etc), planes and dragon weapons (monsoon, sdc, mw, etc). now i am at home Scully, so i won't see any replies til i get to work tomorrow, but i expect a full report on my desk that you have accepted the truth!

your partner,

Mulder
